channel.title: CVE Feed for Korenix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Korenix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7396|2024-09-03T15:36:02.184Z -- korenix -- jetport%205601v3
item.description: Missing encryption of sensitive data in Korenix JetPort 5601v3 allows Eavesdropping.This issue affects JetPort 5601v3: through 1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-7397|2024-08-05T14:26:13.585Z -- korenix -- jetport%205601v3
item.description: Improper filering of special characters result in a command ('command injection') vulnerability in Korenix JetPort 5601v3.This issue affects JetPort 5601v3: through 1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-2371|2024-08-01T19:11:53.396Z -- korenix -- jeti%2Fo%206550
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in Korenix JetI/O 6550 affecting firmware version F208 Build:0817. The SNMP protocol uses plaintext to transfer data, allowing an attacker to intercept traffic and retrieve credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-2371|2024-06-04T17:30:00.407Z -- korenix -- jeti%2Fo%206550
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in Korenix JetI/O 6550 affecting firmware version F208 Build:0817. The SNMP protocol uses plaintext to transfer data, allowing an attacker to intercept traffic and retrieve credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-7397|2024-08-05T13:25:43.610Z -- korenix -- jetport%205601v3
item.description: Improper filering of special characters result in a command ('command injection') vulnerability in Korenix JetPort 5601v3.This issue affects JetPort 5601v3: through 1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-7395|2024-08-05T13:16:05.964Z -- korenix -- jetport%205601v3
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in Korenix JetPort 5601v3 allows an attacker to access functionality on the device without specifying a password.This issue affects JetPort 5601v3: through 1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-7396|2024-08-05T13:20:57.997Z -- korenix -- jetport%205601v3
item.description: Missing encryption of sensitive data in Korenix JetPort 5601v3 allows Eavesdropping.This issue affects JetPort 5601v3: through 1.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-7395|2024-08-07T20:35:18.123Z -- korenix -- jetport%205601v3
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in Korenix JetPort 5601v3 allows an attacker to access functionality on the device without specifying a password.This issue affects JetPort 5601v3: through 1.2.
